Package com.sun.kvem.midp.io.j2se.wma.client

Interface Summary
WMAClient.MessageListener Register a MessageListener with a WMAClient to receive notification when a new message arrives.
 

Class Summary
WMA20Client  
WMAClient Send and receive WMAMessages to other WMAClients via the WMA Server.
WMAClient.MessageListenerAdapter A convenience to easily create an anonymous MessageListener.
WMAClientFactory  
 

Exception Summary
PhoneNumberNotAvailableException Holds the error condition that occurs when a WMAClient attempts to connect to the WMA Server and requests a phone number that is not available.
